mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room WHERE roomno NOT IN(SELECT distinct ro.roomno FROM reserve re RIGHT JOIN room ro ON re.roomno = ro.roomno WHERE (TO_DATE(#{startday}, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN re.startday AND re.endday) AND (TO_DATE(#{endday}, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN re.startday AND re.endday)) and rcity = #{rcity} and rpeople >= #{rpeople}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM room WHERE roomno NOT IN(SELECT distinct ro.roomno FROM reserve re RIGHT JOIN room ro ON re.roomno = ro.roomno WHERE (TO_DATE(#{startday}, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN re.startday AND re.endday) AND (TO_DATE(#{endday}, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN re.startday AND re.endday)) and rcity = #{rcity} and rpeople >= #{rpeople}) a) WHERE rnum>=#{startrow} AND rnum<=#{endrow}
SELECT roomno, rname, rprice, rtype, CASE WHEN #{roomNo} > roomno THEN 'N' WHEN #{roomNo} < roomno THEN 'Y' END PREVYN FROM room WHERE roomno IN (#{roomNo} + 1, #{roomNo} - 1)

SELECT startday, endday FROM (SELECT v.startday, v.endday, v.roomno FROM review w, reserve v WHERE w.userno=v.userno AND v.roomno=#{roomNo} AND v.userno=#{userno} ORDER BY v.startday DESC) WHERE rownum<=1
